mike amundsen wrote:
> 
> 
> How about this:
> 
> When a person requests the representation to fill out (the one w/ the 
> captcha rendering)
> - generate a captcha image and create a new resource for it 
> (/captchas/a1s2d3f3g4)
> - in the response representation, include an embed link (<img />) to the 
> generated captcha resource _and_ a hidden input that contains the same URI

That would mean that every access to the form would have to be via POST (because generating the image resource is a side-effect and therefore not allowed for GET) so you can't simply link to the form.

Regards,
  Simon
